app.csv_to_es module¶

class app.csv_to_es.ElasticConnection(csv_filepath, local: bool = False, port: int = 9200)¶

Bases: object

add_data_()¶

It takes a dataframe, converts it to a generator, and then uses the bulk function from the elasticsearch-helpers library to add the data to the index.

create_connection()¶

It creates a connection to the Elasticsearch server, and then adds the data from the csv file to the server

Returns:

The elasticsearch client

doc_generator(df)¶

It takes a dataframe and returns a generator that yields a dictionary for each row in the dataframe

Parameters:

df – the dataframe that contains the data you want to index

filterKeys(document)¶

It takes a dictionary as an argument and returns a new dictionary with only the keys specified in the list use_these_keys

Parameters:

document – The document to be filtered.

Returns:

A dictionary with the keys that are in the list use_these_keys
